About Blog

I'm a student at RIT, graduating this upcoming Spring. I was born and raised in Pittsburgh and after graduation I'll be moving to Austin to work full-time at AMD as a Product Engineer. Check out my resume to get a better idea of my professional background and interests.

Outside of work I enjoy skateboarding, playing basketball and volleyball, rock climbing, reading, and going on road trips with friends.
